instructions: **Version:** 1.0This character sheet was originally made for **Maschinenleben** (released later this year), a fan product for the **Savage Worlds Adventure Edition** (SWADE) about cyborgs struggling with their loss of self. Due to its extensive build and customization options, it may be used for many other settings as well.#### Notable Features* **Blocks:** Toggle blocks for Allies, Augmentations, Powers, Vehicles, and more.* **Extra Sheet:** Simplified and compact alternative (for NPCs).* **Setting Agnostic:** Toggle/Rename labels and (custom) skills.* **Setting Rules:** Enable/Disable optional rules and functions.* **Roll Templates:** Roll multiple dice (RoF 1-6) with a custom Wild Die.* **Failures/Botches:** Dice that show a [1] or [2] are color coded.* **Sleek:** Minimalist design inspired by pencil layouts on graph paper.* **Silhouettes:** They look fancy! You can also add color markers as indicators.* **Help:** The sheet features an extensive help section under the Settings tab.#### Notes* Requires a mouse to fully operate (hover). Poor touch support.* Some attributes have to be translated (renamed) manually.* Join the [support game](https://app.roll20.net/join/8488284/oQJGfg) for bug reports and requests.---

useroptions.description: Use the No Power Points Setting Rule (SWADE 140).
Use the Strain rules from the Science Fiction Companion (SFC 29).
Skill rolls will always query the amount of skill dice.
Makes the run die Ace.
Wound penalties are not subtracted from the run die.
Show the Allies block.
Show the Augmentations (Cyberware) block, with Integrity/Loss (Maschinenleben) unless Strain is enabled.
Show the Engram block for special Hacking actions.
Show the Integrity block with Loss effects.
Show the Power/Energy block.
Show the Powers/Spells block.
Show the Power Armor block.
Show the Vehicles block.
Show the Walkers block.
Show the Boating (Agility) skill.
